Nov 15 (Reuters) - Third Point LLC :: *THIRD POINT LLC UPS SHARE STAKE IN AMAZON.COM INC TO 185,000 SHARES FROM 145,000 SHARES - SEC FILING *THIRD POINT LLC - CHANGE IN HOLDINGS ARE AS OF SEPTEMBER 30, 2021 AND COMPARED WITH THE PREVIOUS QUARTER ENDED AS OF JUNE 30, 2021


((Reuters Investor Briefs; email: reutersinvestor.briefs@thomsonreuters.com)) Source Date/Time = 15-NOV-202121:24:00.197 GMT
